page.title: 03LAZENBY BANK
page.content: This area is mostly{sloping hillside land.The path which we followed from the top of the{New Incline}used to be a railway track from the{mines}and we could still see{ruined buildings}and sidings.Nearly all the time we were walking there were trees around us.These were mostly{deciduous}with a few{conifers}amongst them.In the wood we saw a{mine entrance}which had been blocked off and a bit further along was another{disused mine}.We came to a sandstone bridge which crossed a track and turned to climb up a rough track which took us through woodland to the top of the hill.Here we saw {farmland}and small areas of conifers. In one field there were{sheep.}In the other there were{cows and calves}of mixed breed and a large{white bull. }
